head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STRASSMAN, SOLOMON E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STRASSMAN, SOLOMON E.

block.p: STRASSMAN-Solomon E. Beloved husband of Natalie, devoted father of Judith and Eric Herbst, Toby and Harold Weinberger, proud and loving grandfather of James and Karen Weinberger, and Elisabeth, Andrea and Seth Herbst, honored brother of Sylvia Lupkin and Hi. The family will gather Sunday, 10AM, at ''Sinai Chapels'' (1-800-446-0406) prior to graveside services at Beth Moses Cemetery, Pinelawn, NY.
